item.title: Space Rock Armageddon
item.description:
About This Game

Space Rock Armageddon is a bold and dynamic space arcade game, boasting lightning-fast gameplay and an explosion of vibrant colors that make it feel like an eighties arcade classic.

While the original Asteroids relied on minimalist black-and-white graphics and a gradual pace, Space Rock Armageddon catapults players into a visually stunning and high-speed cosmic adventure from the outset. Asteroids hurtle towards the player's spacecraft with breathtaking velocity, demanding rapid reflexes and precision.

What sets Space Rock Armageddon apart is its visual brilliance. Every collision results in a spectacular burst of neon hues, creating a dazzling spectacle. It's like navigating through a cosmic fireworks display where each explosion is a work of art.

This captivating visual design, combined with the game's relentless pace, creates an exhilarating experience.

item.title: Desert Loner
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world after the end of the world. You are a lone traveler, surviving in a devastated desert where chaos and destruction reign. You will have to use all your skills to fight for survival and search for resources in this ruthless world. Grabbing your weapon, you go in search of dangerous thugs who are ready to kill at any price. Get ready for incredible adventures and dangerous battles in this post-apocalyptic game. Good luck, traveler!

The game is a 2D platformer with quest elements. You have to advance through the levels by completing tasks while being in a certain location and destroying enemies.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Enemy in the Abyss
item.description:
About This Game

Join the spaceship pilot and go into the very lair of the enemy in this exciting game!
Your hero will have to face numerous waves of enemies trying to stop you and prevent you from completing your mission. Your task is to fight them off and make your way deeper and deeper into the very heart of the enemy base. Use a variety of weapons to defeat your opponents and successfully complete your mission.

But be careful - the enemies become stronger and more difficult with each passing level. You will have to act quickly and skillfully to avoid deadly attacks and steadily defend against all the new threats that await you.

Do everything to complete your task and deliver a fatal blow to the very heart of the enemy empire.

item.title: Fitting-In
item.description:
About This Game

As you work through a level, your past moves are stored in a move history. When you move in the pattern ‚Äúdirection, direction, opposite direction, direction‚Äù (for example up, up, down, up) you perform a happy jump which flings you three places instead of one. Things start to heat up when different blocks get introduced that serve as both obstacles and advantages. Walls are the simplest block. You can‚Äôt walk through them and have to happy jump over them. Pause blocks are tricky buggers. You can walk inside of them, but the move you make into them is not counted in your move history. The move you make out of the block is counted! Break blocks are the opposite. You can‚Äôt walk inside a break block, but running into it will add to the move history even though your player stays in exactly the same spot. Move blocks can be pushed around to clear a path or used in tandem with break blocks to make some crazy moves possible.

There are currently 39 levels! I hope you have as much fun playing them as I have had making them.

item.title: MailRabit
item.description:
About This Game

You are a diligent rabbit whose job is to put mail in the post box. You and the moon love carrots. You will go crazy dancing if you don‚Äôt keep eating carrots. So use your special skill to make carrots from mochi and keep working.



‚Ä¢In the gimmick using mochi, you can make carrots by putting mochi into Usu, or you can make Usu that makes even more delicious carrots by combining Usu.

‚Ä¢Let‚Äôs conquer all 13 stages while using mochi on various types of stages!

‚Ä¢This game is a 3D action game that operates easily with a keyboard and mouse.

‚Ä¢You can control the game from a dynamic camera angle that lets you enjoy the beautiful scenery and the cute rabbit.

‚Ä¢There is also a comprehensive tutorial guide to help you learn the game mechanics and tips.

item.title: BlazBlue Entropy Effect
item.description:
About This Game



Charismatic character designs with unique aesthetic styles and dramatic animations create a flamboyant, awesome combat experience.



Smooth controls, infinite possibilities of combos, and realistic combat feedback. This is the roguelite game with the best action experience yet!



Ten playable characters with vibrant personalities, unique combat styles, and immersive voice-acting.



There are hundreds of moves for you to build around, plus countless elemental effects and legacy skills passed between characters. The possibilities are infinite. Time to make the best fighter of your own!



In the future where the world has been plunged into chaos, people enter a cyberspace called ACE, seeking their last chance to resolve the crisis.
If you are the only person in this world who knows the truth, how will you react?
The ending is also the beginning. Your decision will decide humanity's future.

*BlazBlue Entropy Effect is a spin-off of the BlazBlue series, featuring a new original storyline and world setting that is separate from the main plot of the BlazBlue series.

item.title: Ôºì„Å§„ÅÆÁÑ°Á™ÆÂãï -Trois Mouvements perp√©tuels-
item.description:
About This Game

Three new games about music are included.

Algorithm Master

A puzzle game about composing music.
The animals represent chords, each with a specific direction to advance.
There is a clear condition for each stage, but there is more than one correct answer.
  • 20 stages
  • 20x8 jingles to play by recombination

Silence Rhythm Master

A rhythm game without music.
The area of a slice of cake represents the length of the sound.
By cutting the cake according to the model, you can reproduce famous rhythms.
  • 30 stages
  • Click sound hints can be given

Classical Music Racing

Action game played by ear.
Collect the coins that you can see and cannot see.
Even if you can't read music, you can clear the game by memorizing the melody, You can clear the game.
  • 14 stages, half of which are practice stages
  • 7 arrangements of classical music
(as in the previous version, vocal synths without lyrics are included)

For the past three games and this game, You are welcome to distribute videos of you playing these games.

item.title: Mage Rumble
item.description:
About This Game

Battle for victory by casting a variety of spells on your opponents until there's only one mage (or team) standing. Purchase new spells between rounds using coins you've earned during the fight. Every game is different, with randomly-generated terrain, randomly-positioned mages and 10 unique spells to choose from (some of which are affected by wind). Play by yourself, with others online and computer opponents in teams or free-for-all.



Customize Your Game
  • Play with 2 to 24 mages with any combination of players and computers
  • Set your team settings: number of teams and number of mages on each team or free-for-all
  • Select each computer's skill, from random to accurate
  • Adjust wind settings from none to strong
  • Choose the total number of rounds, maximum turns in each round and the length of each turn

item.title: Splice
item.description:
About This Game

This is a short escape room styled horror experience. Play time will vary, but a single ending can be achieved in 30 minutes or less.

Sam Foster is the new kid in security team for CyroArk, a scientific research company. His first week is spend at a research bunker underneath the Arizona desert. All has gone well so far, but he has learned something about this company that he wishes he knew beforehand. The company is conducting illegal DNA splicing experiments on human subjects and has now been threatened with his life if he decides to leave or reveal the secret.

Then, something unexpected happens. An experiment has escaped. Screams and the sounds of ripping flesh can be heard from Sam's security office. Something terrifying has broken free.

As a result, a security lockdown has been triggered, and the only way to reset it is to reboot the mainframe. But that means facing what is out there, the creature that has seemingly killed everyone remaining in the bunker.

Three days have passed since the lockdown. Sam hasn't left the safety of his security room. His supplies have been vanquished. It is time face his fears and plan his escape.

FEATURES

  • Use CCTV to scan the halls before making your next move
  • Run and hide as you have no means to fight back
  • Solve puzzles to gain access to locations you need to visit
  • Achieve five possible endings

item.title: DEEPEST REGRET
item.description:
About This Game

"DEEPEST REGRET" is a 3D action RPG where the magic swordsman Wisteria embarks on an adventure in a nightmarish world. Collect items, level up, and strategically progress through battles.

Since the maps are dark, rely on the fairy's light to explore the paths. The protagonist can use two types of magic in normal mode and demon mode. By leveraging their respective characteristics, you can overcome challenging situations.

The enemy specters are incredibly powerful, so use magic to deal significant damage and defeat them. The game offers about 30 minutes of gameplay.

item.title: Rush Commander
item.description:
About This Game

Rush Commander is a survivor, with reinfocerment mechanics and a top view where your main task is to survive. Manage your company through the battlefield without being killed by the never-ending forces of the Third Reich. Request reinforcements and improve them; with a roguelike progression style and a full range of army upgrades, you can improve your chances in the battle to become the best commander and see a new day.


And careful, there are rumors of great foes... but don't be afraid they can't be true... a super what?

How to play

Move, shoot, move, shoot, summon reinforcements, repeat.

Start the game with a small company, WASD to move, fight, call for reinforcements, and improve through leveling up to survive the battle. The enemy will try to destroy you, so you must rush and be faster!

Features


  • Direct Gameplay, "traditional" survivor style
  • Fast-paced. Just fight, be fast, and enjoy it!
  • Explore the different Atlatinc most famous war fronts with a low-poly style
  • Defend yourself against dozens or even hundreds of enemies
  • 4 unique heroes. There are plenty of units to choose from
  • Tons of units to summon. Take advantage of its different stats and strategies.
  • Roguelike progression style: level up, choose wisely, and defeat those nasty bastards
  • Master it, replay it, keep improving, try new tactics
  • War upgrades with a lot of possibilities and options

The war is awaiting you. Get ready for the battle!

item.title: Mothman
item.description:
About This Game

Mothman is a phycological horror game in which you and up to three other players seek down and hunt a sinister demon known as Mothman. Your goal is to kill the demon, it is the only way you will survive. You have gone deep in the woods of Point Pleasant, West Virginia, USA armed with guns and traps in order to finally kill this monster. You must hunt down Mothman while ensuring you remain quiet, stealthy, and agile. You will have to determine when to take action, and when to avoid conflict.

Multiplayer

- Fully supports up to 4 player co-op giving you the ability to hunt together.

Performance

- Designed to run on low end systems, and on high end systems supporting both extreme graphic fidelity or lower quality graphics.

Hunting

- This is a monster you can not run up to with a gun and kill it. You will need to utilize different items and techniques to successfully execute a plan to kill this demon while also ensuring to stay alive. Using traps, range, and bait a plan can be executed to complete the task.

item.title: Unsolved Case: Killer Popularity Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! Your name still makes countless criminals tremble at the sound of it. But there are others who commit crimes with cold calculation, trying to outsmart you. Prove them wrong! This new collection of crime episodes is full of terrifying and bone-chilling murders, break-ins, and robberies. We believe you are the only one who can stop the perpetrators, but just in case, we've sent Paul to you for backup. Your faithful partner will be there to assist you or even bring you a new case.
Play now and find out! Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

‚ôüÔ∏è Your own choices!
You have the opportunity to choose the character's phrases for a particular action and influence the plot of the mystery detective story. Don‚Äôt forget that only your choice defines the course of these complex investigations and could affect the characters' lives!

‚ôüÔ∏è A variety of achievements!
Conduct your own investigation by solving intricate puzzles, solving complex riddles and playing various mini-games. You need to get to the truth by searching crime scenes, collecting clues and interviewing suspects. Take the lead in each investigation and unlock all achievements to emphasize your success!

‚ôüÔ∏è Bonus materials!
Collect all the pieces of evidence and catch criminals, successfully close the cases to gain access to the bonus locations, where you will reveal some interesting details about characters. Some crime cases look impossible to solve, but you can do it, can you?

‚ôüÔ∏è Collectible items!
A new exciting set of the detective story is full of different clues and mysterious objects that the player needs to find in order to advance in the investigation! Search collector's items at each crime scene and find hidden objects. You will have to be very attentive to gather the entire collection!

item.title: Grim Clicker
item.description:
About This Game

Grim Clicker is an IDLE/RPG clicker where you will find your own strategy to explore the lost worlds. Inspired by games such as Diablo, Grim Dawn, Dark Souls, etc., the game features a complex character development, many unique items, active and passive playstyle.

Key Features:

  • Skills - A large and clever skill tree provides a lot of ways for character development.
  • Inventory management - You can improve your weapons, enchant them, disassemble them and create new ones. In addition to weapons, there are plenty of other items to help you on your journey.
  • Ritual - If you feel your combination no longer works, perform the ritual and start over. Every time you will become stronger!
  • Idle/Clicker - The character is immortal, so you can safely let him fight on his own, and only manage the general trend. Or, if you like to click, come up with your own strategy in this manner and help the hero on his way to knowledge.
  • Shop - The shop of shards and black wax will offer you improvements that will sharpen your own style and increase the power of your hero.
  • Chests - The rich chests contain masters' weapons, materials for crafting, potions, pets - in short, everything that the old masters put there. This is your support in the dark world of Grim Clicker!
  • Cosmic Scale - The further you go through the game, the more possibilities you have. The new content implies new game strategies.
  • Sound - Beautiful soundtrack and attention to sound.
  • Mystery - Who are you? Why are you here? Look for the remains of ancient civilizations, travel through the desecrated shards, find allies!

item.title: Psychopomp
item.description:
About This Game


Welcome to the world of PSYCHOPOMP.
There are catacombs hidden under every building in the world.
Everyone knew about them, but lied to you about them your entire life.

Descend into the depths, and see what awaits below.

Psychopomp is a short Psychological Horror Dungeon Crawler.
Something is wrong with the world, everything is not as you remember.
You don't know why, but everything draws you to the Earth, to the tunnels below. Do the answers await you there, or is something far worse in store?

  • Classic 3D Dungeon Crawler Gameplay!
  • Unique Creatures and Enemies, all sorts of bizarre horrors await you below!
  • Strange Secrets to Find!
  • Bizarre characters to encounter, maybe some friends along the way?
  • Explore a unique and atmospheric world, and uncover the lies that have covered it all up!

Enter the catacombs, and immerse yourself in a world that only grows darker the deeper you get.
Keep your wits about you, watch your back, and survive.

item.title: Hex Racer
item.description:
About This Game

Race through the asteroid belt as fast as possible while constrolling youe ship to fly thorugh the checkpoints to increase your score, using power ups to help you.

Game Modes
- Monthly seed generated event with leaderboard, Get your highest score without missing a single checkpoint.
- Endless - random generated, Get your highest score without missing a single checkpoint.
- Split Screen - Grab your controllers and race your friends and family in local split screen timed races.
- Story mode - progress through the map unlocking new ships and skills to help in the races.

Checkpoints - Fly through checkpoints to increase your score



Power ups - Fly through a power up to use it

item.title: Rock Tetrus
item.description:
About This Game

This is an extremely cozy, laid-back strategy Puzzle Game.

It is a low-stakes, 'move at your own pace' kind of game.

Stack the blocks, make a solid line, watch the rocks crumble and fall!

I made this in about 2 days, and was inspired by a Mobile Game Ad I saw.
The ad was fake and pre-rendered, but it looked so fun that I decided to make it in real life, for people to enjoy.

You can play this game for hours and still have fun strategizing which blocks you should place where, to break the next line.

I spent so much time playing this, when I should have been developing a trailer for it.
The sound effects are extremely satisfying, and the visuals are pleasing to the eyes.

It is infinitely replayable.

Hope you enjoy this simple little game I made!

item.title: ACROBATIC CAR - Sound Track
item.description:
About This Content

music of "ACROBATIC CAR" game

item.title: Twilight Oracle
item.description:
About This Game

Journey to a strange world in search of the fabled Oracle in this fantasy comedy point & click adventure. Play as Leo, a struggling student with the ability to breathe underwater, and explore a desert island and the depths of an alien ocean to uncover your school‚Äôs dark past.



Explore the mysterious forests, caves, and shores of an alien world, and plunge into its uncharted depths to uncover its secrets.



Unravel the mysteries of the island with the help of your friends, each with their own unique ability. Collaborate with Marcus, who can conjure fire from thin air, Jill, who can read minds, and Olivia, who can summon a gust of wind.



Get ready to solve puzzles and enjoy the witty (and at times, juvenile) banter between Leo and his friends. Immerse yourself in Twilight Oracle's nostalgic atmosphere reminiscent of classic retro adventures.

Game Features:

‚Ä¢ A rich world of a classic 2D point-and-click adventure game.
‚Ä¢ Stunning pixel-art landscapes.
‚Ä¢ Full English Voice Over.
‚Ä¢ Subtitles in English, Spanish, German, Italian, French, and Portuguese (BR).
‚Ä¢ Humorous banter between Leo and his friends.
‚Ä¢ Steam achievements.
‚Ä¢ Beautifully crafted scrolling rooms.
‚Ä¢ Detailed character portraits.
‚Ä¢ Puzzles, naturally!

item.title: Long Steel
item.description:
About This Game

In the Grand Archipelago, is the island of Melas. During the great War of Land and Sky, when the humans turned against the arrogant Sky People, this island served as the beating heart of the world... But when times of peace came, Melas nearly became ground zero for the end of days when the cruel Shaper of Magic, Warlock, was set loose. Twenty years have passed since the people of Melas rose up to defeat Warlock, and now his heinous worshippers seek to resurrect him from his ashes. It is up to you to do everything in your power to stop the dark Wicken Cult, and prevent the second coming of Warlock.

Long Steel is an action-adventure RPG that aims to challenge the player. Battle monsters to gain xp, and level up to become strong enough to face greater challenges. As you embark on your quest, you will find many items to unlock new paths and come face to face with puzzles, obstacles and treacherous dungeon bosses. Slice, shoot and cast magic spells to pave your way through the punishing landscapes. Cooking food, alchemizing potions and crafting new weapons will aid you on your journey. Complete side quests and explore the world to find items that will make you strong enough to cut down any foe that dares to cross your path!

--- Key Features ---

‚Ä¢ Travel through diverse landscapes
‚Ä¢ Fight your way through 9 dungeons
‚Ä¢ Meet over a hundred NPCS
‚Ä¢ Cook, Smith, and Alchemize equipment, weapons, potions and food
‚Ä¢ Complete lots of side quests
‚Ä¢ Traverse through mini dungeons
‚Ä¢ Level to 30, increasing your health, mana and stamina as you go
‚Ä¢ Find upgrades to make you stronger and more durable
‚Ä¢ Lots of hidden secrets and easter eggs!
‚Ä¢ And lots more!

--- Controls ---

Keyboard Controller
‚Ä¢Pause: D Key ‚Ä¢Pause: Left Bumper
‚Ä¢Attack/Save: C Key ‚Ä¢Attack/Save: Right Button
‚Ä¢Action: Space bar ‚Ä¢Action: Bottom Button
‚Ä¢Item keys: X and V Keys ‚Ä¢Item keys: Left and Top Buttons
‚Ä¢Movement: Arrow Keys ‚Ä¢Movement: Left Joystick




Long Steel is created with the Solarus Game Engine, a free, open-source game engine.

item.title: Alien Horizon (Preview Alpha)
item.description:
About This Game

Alien Horizon is a sci-fi survival city builder set on an inhospitable alien planet.

Faced with imminent destruction of Earth, humanity pooled together their resources and sent sleeper ships to nearby potentially habitable planets. But this one turned out to be much less habitable than expected. Can you survive anyway?

From one ship to a colony

Build your colony around the sleeper ship, containing 1000 last survivors from Earth. Construct power sources, housing, infrastructure and factories to ensure comfort of your colonists and provide the colony with all the resources it needs. Manage bus lines, set laws and provide services, making sure your colonists are happy, healthy and productive. Each colonist is their own simulated individual.

On your own

Earth is dead, so it can't help you out here. If you didn't bring something with you, tough luck. Explore the landscape around you to find all the other ships from your fleet that carry supplies, and survey resource deposits to eventually produce your own.

Complex resource management

Manage complex production chains to produce 86 different resources, each with a realistic recipe. Build logistics hubs and set up storages to make sure all of them get to where they need.

Preview alpha

Even though this is a free preview, it's a full-fledged game of its own, with no time or content limitations. It is possible to achieve a self-sufficient colony. The proper game is still in development and will be released later. You can support its development by buying the Donation packs.

item.title: ANCIENT SOULS TAMAG
item.description:
About This Game

READ BEFORE YOU BUY!

The Game is hard and can be frustrating sometimes.
The game has a demo that is quite sufficient to introduce itself. I don't recommend you to buy it without trying it.

STORY

Erlik Han the god of underworld (Tamag) wakes up and tries to return to earth as he promised to Father. "Asena '' the wolf goddess will help him to succeed in this adventure.



GAMEPLAY

50+ different Skills
14 unique levels with 2-4 Hours storyline gameplay.
Challenging traps and puzzles
10 unique enemies with different battle tactics and 4 different difficulties and Boss Modes.
Endless Arena Mode
Demo contains 3 storyline levels and Endless dungeon mode.

item.title: Pyrocast
item.description:
About This Game

Pyrocast is an exciting 2D adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a pyromancer who has the powerful ability to create and control fire. In this dark fantasy game, the player embarks on a journey through a mysterious dark forest, seeking to gain ancient knowledge and uncover the secrets of his magical abilities.
The player's main task is to use his pyromantic abilities to destroy enemies hidden in the depths of the forest. As the player travels, he will have to fight monsters and hostile creatures, using a variety of fire attacks to advance and fight for his goals.
Pyrocast offers exciting gameplay and a colorful environment that creates a unique atmosphere of magic and danger. Feel free to venture into this mystical world and overcome all obstacles on your path to victory!

item.title: The Pair Annihilation
item.description:
About This Game

Grid-based and turn-based roguelike

After defeat in the war against the Udtmos, we were forced to flee the stellar system.
We must rewind everything with only three pilots.

Build the ultimate ship

Obtain reactor cores and additional weapons that you can equip to your ship to build the ultimate ship to defeat the enemy.

Reach the star via the optimal route

Depending on the situation, you can set the best route to reach the star.
You'll also encounter a variety of missions on the battlefield, such as destroying incubators or locking out a portal.

Rewind the turn at the optimal time

You can rewind an ally's turn at least once in each battle.
You can defeat all enemies with just one rewind, so be sure to use it in optimal situations.

We're looking forward to your victory.

item.title: Cave of Illusions: Twistyland
item.description:
About This Game

An atmospheric experience putting you back where the previous events left off in the first game of the series. Now focused around a little girl Sophie, her world is consumed when a strange board game catches her attention in a toy store.



Play a horror board game, rolling the dice and exploring each part of it with new gameplay, puzzles, vivid and surreal environments and the creepy clown Vasilus stalking you and leading you into the Cave of Illusions. Explore Quirky Quacker Love Tunnel, Giddy-up Carousel, Hippity Hop Hut, Tip-Toe Treat Trail, Titter Toy Store, Shenanigan Shingles and finally Cave of Illusions.



Vasilus plays with you not only using dice, but cards as well, inside each part of the board game he gives you a useful special card that helps you get through the level, but sometimes it also helps Vasilus too. Please enjoy the very unique, diverse and creepy board game - Cave of Illusions: Twistyland!

item.title: Balls of Steel
item.description:
About This Game

The Balls are Back! The legendary 90s pinball game Balls of Steel returns to PC in all of its radical retro glory. Play through 5 classic top-down pinball tables: Darkside, Barbarian, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island. Not only that, we've added two BRAND NEW tables in classic BoS Style: Centipede, and Missile Command! Get 7 awesome retro tables in one package!

Features:


  • Enjoy 5 Classic BoS tables: Barbarian, Darkside, Firestorm, Mutation, and Devil's Island, rebuilt to run on modern PC hardware!
  • Play 2 brand-new Atari-themed tables: Centipede and Missile Command. Enjoy the retro ambience while you fight back bugs and waves of incoming missiles.
  • Keyboard, gamepad, or mouse controls let you play the way you want.

item.title: El Dorado: The Golden City Builder - Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1451470/El_Dorado_The_Golden_City_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1505940/Orc_Warchief_Strategy_City_Builder/

This is the prologue of our upcoming El Dorado: The Golden City Builder - the prologue is just part of the full game that will let you get to know the game before its official release and it's completely free.


Build the mightiest and most expansive empire of Yucatan

Your aim in the game of El Dorado: The Golden City Builder - Prologue, is to create the mightiest empire of the whole Yucatan peninsula. Develop your early small settlement into a city bustling with life and dripping with gold. Build, develop, manage your resources and appease the Gods. Dominate other newly rising or existing settlements of other families through conquest or peaceful talks. Diplomacy or blood‚Ä¶ it is your choice.

Become the architect of your mythical city

As the Leader, you will be responsible for every building built on your territory, such as sawmills, temples, housing, barracks and many more. Skillfully plan your city as every path may play a vital role in managing your city. Well-planned zones of your empire will have a special impact on the proper and quickly develop your city. The fate of the citizens depends on you.

Gather resources

There are many resources on your territory crucial for the development, conquest and keeping your empire stable. Some will be used for daily life, other resources will have a chance to become part of a variety of weapons ‚Äì so vital to plan your skirmishes.

Offer sacrifices to the Gods to earn their favor‚Ä¶

Without sacrifices, there is no game based on a mythical ancient tribe, right? God's favor is one of the basic and important quests in the game. Thanks to their approval your city will not only develop freely but also expand its borders and acquire greater military and political capabilities. Satisfy your Gods to avoid their wrath. You can make sacrifices through your Priest in places of worship such as temples. Choose an appropriate slave, organize a grand festival in honor of the chosen Deity and perform secret dark rituals to the delight of the audience. In return, you can expect divine protection from different cataclysms or an increase in yields from your farms and fields.

‚Ä¶ or prepare for their wrath

Gold, riches, extraordinary development‚Ä¶ it can‚Äôt be that easy. Each repeating or grand one-time festival requires sacrifices. If you happen to forget about worship, the Deities will send many cataclysms to your empire or other problems that will hinder your development. Some will be more or less taxing, but it is always better to evade a lone lightning bolt striking your home and setting the city ablaze or a huge tornado wreaking havoc in your city. Plan well what and when you offer your Gods as no mortal has survived their wrath.

Conquer and enslave neighboring people

Every gold is paid for in blood and war is the easiest way to get rich fast. Plunder resources, earn slaves and conquer new land needed for development. Gods are not the only worry, there are other peoples and tribes aiming for the same goal as you. Organize military expeditions, and reinforce the war front or defense lines with resources, which will help in your skirmishes with the enemy. Skillful resource management during war will have an impact on whether your people will come back as victorious conquerors bearing gifts or losers. Fight for the title of the mightiest ruler of the Golden City, El Dorado!

Do not lose yourself in pride.

item.title: Is it different or not?
item.description:
About This Game

‚ÄúIs it different or not?‚Äù is for the true detectives of spotting. Your task is to scrutinize every corner of a schoolroom for differences. If the room is perfect, you can safely move forward. However, if you notice even the slightest difference, you must step back. Your primary weapon in this game is a keen eye and quick reaction time.

Immerse yourself in the school days atmosphere and test your spotting skills in ‚ÄúIs it different or not?‚Äù A variety of rooms filled with riddles and secrets await you. Complete all

item.title: Five elements for 24!
item.description:
About This Game

On that day, mankind remembered the fear of being dominated by the math Olympiad in primary school.

Four random numbers, three operations, 24 points!

The 24-dot game is a simple and fun math game in which the goal is to make the result of four numbers equal to 24 by adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing four operations (each operation can be used any number of times). This game can not only exercise the player's calculation ability and logical thinking, but also improve the player's sensitivity to numbers and operators.

Here are the rules of the game:

There are four numbers in the game, each between 1 and 9.
Players need to add, subtract, multiply, and divide four operations so that the result of these four numbers is equal to 24.
Each number can only be used once and must be used in full.
Players are free to adjust the order of numbers, but the result must be equal to 24.

If you like math games can join us QQ group number: 494130141

item.title: Skateboard Gravity
item.description:
About This Game

"Skateboard Gravity: A Journey into the Gravitational World". Get ready for an exciting adventure in a world where gravity becomes your best friend!
Skateboard Gravity is an exciting platformer with a side view and incredible gameplay that takes you to an exciting world of the future, where a hero on a skateboard controls gravity. In this exciting game you will have a unique opportunity to switch between different directions of gravity to overcome obstacles, collect money and conquer new levels.

Features of the game:

Gravity control: Your character, a professional skater of the future, has a special device that allows you to change gravity. This allows you to roll along the ceilings and even in flight change the direction of gravity to complete the levels.

Exciting levels: Immerse yourself in the world of the future, full of amazing locations. Each level offers new challenges and puzzles that can be completed using your skill and gravity.

item.title: Ghost legend
item.description:
About This Game

This is a racing simulation game with a bicycle themed gameplay, where you can showcase your skills to compete in cycling competitions. With more exciting and exciting game graphics, you can choose different time periods to embark on cycling challenges. Although bike games are not as exciting as motorcycles and racing cars, awesome still has a strong sense of realism when playing many games. In the game, players control the contestant to drive a bicycle and embark on a crazy journey, each segment being fun. You showcase your cycling skills on various tracks and win more gold medals that belong to you. There are many scenes and levels in the game waiting for you to challenge, and dozens of cool models waiting for you to unlock and experience.

item.title: ÊåÇÂß¨ÊÅ∂È≠î IDLE DEVILS
item.description:
About This Game

[Game Description]

Idle Devils is a leisure strategic placement game. In addition to rich roles, skills and equipment systems, you can also freely choose the devil to cultivate. Through her, you can conquer new female demons, constantly expand your power, and finally complete the salvation of the Demon World, becoming a real Demon King.

[About this game]

The Demon World was infected with a violent miasma, which caused chaos in the Demon World. The Demon King sealed the infected people in each hell with the staff of stars.
200 years later, the seal of the Demon World was broken, but this time the Demon King failed to seal it, even swallowed himself, and the Demon World fell into chaos again
The new king of the Demon World is selected. The one who can seal the seven hells again is the new king.

[Features]

*Rich role cultivation system:

Most of the characters in the game are female demons, and each demon has unique characteristics. Players can freely choose their initial characters to cultivate, and recruit them into their command through combat. Through the role cultivation system, you can make your female demons bigger and stronger!


*Rich skill talent system:
Each character in the game has its unique skills and characteristics. Through learning and cultivating specific skills, we can build a variety of different playing methods;


*Rich equipment brushing system;

In the battle, every time you defeat the enemy, you have a chance to drop the equipment. The equipment will produce different qualities according to the level treasure hunt value. The more high-quality equipment has more affixes, the more chances you have to brush the exclusive affixes!



*. The construction of the Demon World;

The Demon World still has the smell of fireworks. The tavern can purchase equipment and gamble on luck. Gems from gem merchants can make equipment glitter. And that strange alchemy room can always make surprises and surprises!



*The challenge of the Demon King;

The former Demon King was sealed in this Demon King's Tower, and the enemies inside had already been eroded by miasma and turned into monsters. But higher challenges not only contain unique rewards, but also may find the source of miasma, from which the Devil Kingdom can be saved



*. The capture of the character;

If you defeat the leader in a special level, you can redeem him as a member of the team. However, some of them are "terminally ill" and cannot help dispel them. They can only be eliminated.



*. The fun of hanging up;

Finally, as a casual hang up game, the greatest pleasure is the sense of harvest and surprise after hang up!

item.title: Celebrities Hacked
item.description:
About This Game

Celebrities Hacked takes you on a mesmerizing journey that pairs the familiar excitement of classic Qix and Xonix games with an innovative, bold twist. Here, your skills and reflexes are rewarded with a gallery of art that peels back the curtain on some of the most alluring celebrities. As you navigate the game landscape, strategically deploy power-ups, and overcome ticking clock challenges, you unlock the enthralling, unseen layers of the stars' private lives.

Brace yourself for an adrenaline-pumped voyage into the clandestine world of celebrities. Remember to be discreet, as the insights you'll gain are spiced up with intrigue and not intended for the public eye!
Stay alert for the hindrances that can derail your journey - while you do have a few tries, be mindful that the opportunities to retry are limited!
Begin your journey with access to the hidden worlds of two celebrities for free, challenge your dexterity, and see if you can reveal their personal enigmas.
Awaiting your arrival are 12 different celebrities, each holding a unique challenge for the worthy contender who dares to discover their hidden lives.

  • 12 different celebrities await a challenger to hack their photos. [2 in base version of the game, and additional 10 in DLC's!]
  • Explore different settings serving as a background for the phenomenal beauty of girls
  • Expose the covered areas of the pictures and, eventually, reveal the whole picture
  • Unlock the door to the secretive contents of girls' photos - make sure that no one is looking above your shoulder as these pics are saucy and not safe for work!
  • Pay attention to the obstacles that will get in your way ‚Äì you may have a few chances but be wary as the number of attempts is limited!

item.title: FawnRun
item.description:
About This Game

FawnRun
A casual mini-game with very simple controls.
You'll need to focus on dodging all moving objects and successfully picking up random fawn icons, up to 100!
The screen you see is the only level of the game, there are no upgrades, no more levels, no tight time requirements.

How it works:
A/D: Control movement
W: Control the jump
ESC: Pause the game

PS: Please be patient, calm, and move actively.If you can't pick up the fawn icon in the first place, don't worry about it, because the icon will reappear in a certain position in a short time.

End Conditions:
1. Hit any moving object!
2. Close the game!

Clearance Conditions:
1. Collect 100 fawn icons!

Have fun!
